roleset.name: start a dead engine using another car's battery (etc)

role.descr: car with a dead battery getting a jump
instrument (outside power source), if separate from arg0

example.name: jump_start-v: args 0, 1. concatenation needed on the rel
example.text: As we all know , it took WW2 *PRO* to jump start the economy after the last depression , 12 years after it began ...

example.name: jumpstart-v: all args
example.text: When I tried to start it, I noticed the battery was low so I jumpstarted it with another truck, and it started right up

roleset.note: JUMPSTART-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from jumpstart.01-v)
